protein.specific_function: Binds both calcium and zinc. Probably binds 2 zinc ions per molecule. May be involved in calcium-dependent cuticle cell differentiation and hair shaft formation

reference.reference_text: Engelkamp D, Schafer BW, Mattei MG, Erne P, Heizmann CW: Six S100 genes are clustered on human chromosome 1q21: identification of two genes coding for the two previously unreported calcium-binding proteins S100D and S100E. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1993 Jul 15;90(14):6547-51.
